programme.title: Food Factory 2
programme.desc: Discover how gooey glazed donuts get blasted by an icing waterfall, while ice cream bars are given a chocolate bath; why health-conscious Korean astronauts take pickled kimchi into outer space; and the lengths that salt miners will go to to put 'white gold' on people's plates.

programme.title: Food Factory 2
programme.desc: Discover how spicy salsa gets its peppery kick; a tangy ancient cheese once made by monks gets a modern makeover; crunchy fortune cookies come sweet, tasty and packed full of good advice; and a popular summertime snack gets stuffed with ice creamy coolness.

programme.title: Asia 1
programme.desc: In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earth's toughest.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads 6
programme.desc: Comedians Babatunde Aleshe and Kae Kurd go on an unforgettable journey through the Lower Zambezi Valley, a place where the local wildlife is almost as terrifying as the roads.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys 1
programme.desc: In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy 2
programme.desc: Stanley Tucci visits Puglia, a region famous for its fragrant olive oil, beautiful vegetables, cheeses and durum wheat.

programme.title: Dynasties 1
programme.desc: In Senegal, West Africa, live a group of chimpanzees, led by an alpha male named David. He has already been alpha for 3 years - a time when leaders here are usually overthrown. To make matters worse, David has no allies - no-one to help him defend his leadership.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When teens Llianna Adank and Eric Goldstrand are found shot to death at an Oregon park in 1977, every parent's nightmare comes true.

programme.title: Murder And Mayhem In Taipei
programme.desc: It's the biggest manhunt in Taiwan's history when three criminals rapes and murders a famous pop star's daughter, Pai Hsiao Yen, and go on to commit other crimes.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: 18-year-old Nicole Brown meets 30-year-old OJ Simpson while working as a hostess, sparking a whirlwind romance. Despite appearing as the perfect wife and mother, Nicole endures OJ's abuse in private.

programme.title: Women On Death Row

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewelry store; two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip; convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When Gwinnett County detectives find a mother stabbed to death, identifying her killer falls to her young son. But testifying at trial could be difficult for the child.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: Shayna Hubers takes the stand to defend herself after she brutally murdered her on-again, off-again boyfriend, Ryan Poston. She willingly takes the stand to prove her actions were in self-defense.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Two teens under interrogation turn on each other; a suspect attempts a shocking escape from police custody; a husband and wife must answer for their deadly secret; and more.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he’s been missing – real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer has arrived in Alaska.This sets the scene for one of the world's greatest migrations of the Alaskan salmon run.

programme.title: Alaska: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The end of winter heralds one of the world's greatest feeding frenzies as large ocean predators target the millions of fish who have found refuge in the Gulf of Alaska.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, Little penguin Snapper returns to the colony but will he be accepted? The vet team prepare to treat Samantran tiger Sali, and the Zoo helps to save an endangered native species at risk.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, the Ungulate team prepare for a birth, we meet one of the longest living animals and Auckland Zoo helps to save an endangered giant.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Baby Giraffe meets the herd, the Zoo’s five otter brothers are on the move and the ectotherm team search for a hidden for a treasure.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, it's an anxious time for Zoo vets as they work to save one of the most endangered birds on the planet, and the ectotherm team are on a mission in the wild South Island.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.desc: In the first of a five-episode event, the forge is transformed into a Gladiator's arena for a competition. In the opening, two smiths must forge a fierce Roman-era falx but only one will be crowned victor.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S6)
programme.desc: A struggling chocolate maker and a young theatre assistant create the movie theatre concession stand as we know it and launch the world's most iconic movie candies.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S6)
programme.desc: A teacher-turned-restaurateur invents America's most popular cookie, which leads to a battle of food giants and one of the most iconic packaged cookies in history.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Mike and Frank meet some interesting characters whose collections are even more far out and ripe for picking.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the remaining survivalists near day 50, conditions at Reindeer Lake intensify. Desperation rises as the temperatures continue to drop, and personal demons bubble to the surface.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: When Rick sets his sights on a musket rifle from the 1800s, can he take a shot at this deal, or is he off the mark? Meanwhile, a seller tries to flex with a signed autobiography by Arnold Schwarzenegger.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Revolutionary War-era ship hiding under Manhattan to a sprawling Roman villa unearthed in the backyard of a home. The structures uncovered in this episode lead to more questions than answers.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team unveils the greatest mysteries of the Bermuda Triangle: its most perplexing vanished ships and planes, and the strange and powerful forces said to be behind the Triangle's deadly reputation.

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: Third-generation shipwreck hunter Jeff MacKinnon searches the deadly Death Coast for Le Chameau, an 18th-century shipwreck carrying a fortune in rare coins.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1)
programme.desc: From the CIA's decades-long pursuit of the perfect truth serum to the U.S. Army's secret PsyOps in Vietnam, mind games have long been at play among countries, its enemies, and even its own citizens.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S2)
programme.desc: It's one of life's most confounding mysteries: What happens to us after we die? From heaven and hell to resurrection and reincarnation, we'll explore the remarkable possibilities of life after death.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Who was Jack the Ripper? The question has baffled police investigators, historians, and armchair detectives. Countless books, movies, and television shows were based on the Ripper's murderous exploits.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: Investigators Andy Bustamante and Paul Beban investigate Bradshaw Ranch in Sedona, AZ, and encounter dangerous radiation levels, a strange temperature anomaly, and a UAP.

programme.title: CSI S5 E09 - Mea Culpa
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: ALF S1 E21 - Lookin' Through The Windows
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 E10 - And They Are Us
programme.desc: Airwolf is an American action military drama television series that centers on a high-technology military helicopter, code-named Airwolf, and its crew. The show follows them as they undertake various exotic missions, many involving espionage.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S3 E09 - Tom the Hero
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.desc: The drama “Jeon Woo Chi” is based on the ancient classic novel “Jeonwuchi-jeon”. Yet it is peppered with romance, action and comic elements so that everyone regardless of age and sex can sit together and enjoy the show.

programme.title: Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic is reinterpreted by the best vocalists in Korea. Don't miss out on the heart-moving moments that transcend generations.

programme.title: Good Luck!
programme.desc: A life story of three friends, one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich, along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House
programme.desc: A revenge story about a woman in the top 1% starting over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama of people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: Dear.M
programme.desc: A pure, no-filter youth romance drama unraveling a pink-hued mystery as they search for ‘M', the protagonist behind the love letter that turned Seoyeon University upside down.

programme.title: Heart on Wheels
programme.desc: An observational variety show where a mobile convenience store packed with daily necessities is delivered to a rural village, and the night is spent there.

programme.title: The Seasons W
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Cinderella Game
programme.desc: A story of a woman who realizes the meaning of true revenge while she has been used as a fake daughter by her enemy.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women’s Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei’s father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Embark on the journey with two Thai artistes, Gun and Ticha, as they navigate the bustling city life and discover the serene outskirts of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Punish Evil
programme.desc: A shipment of newly issued currency is robbed by three armed robbers, prompting Detective Chang to investigate. Following new leads, he successfully takes down one of the robbers. Meanwhile, the other two plot to rob a gold factory amidst the chaos. With meticulous planning, Chang thwarts their scheme and brings them to justice.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.desc: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbamama and Barbapapa are surprised to see more and more billboards on the road. // Barbalala dreams of becoming a cowgirl and Barbidou is determined to help her.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Total Recall (2012)
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and family are killed by the infamous and elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessed with revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2
programme.desc: Daniel makes another attempt to promote Miyagi Do, and receives guidance in a familiar form. Johnny grows suspicious about Kreese’s backstory. A new Cobra Kai student challenges Miguel and befriends Aisha, while Robby revisits a past he’d rather forget.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2
programme.desc: Daniel struggles to help a new student learn. Miguel makes a new connection, while Johnny tries to repair a relationship. Tensions between the two dojos build to a breaking point.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2
programme.desc: Daniel’s students are given a lesson in overcoming their grudges. Johnny spends some time away from the dojo, while Kreese exerts his influence.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2
programme.desc: To prepare his students, Daniel gives some new training methods a shot. Miguel puts a new lesson into practice. Johnny makes a tough but pivotal decision that affects Cobra Kai.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple start to experience insanely terrifying incidents with the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince Ep1
programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of the a detective agency in Joseon.

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince Ep2
programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of the a detective agency in Joseon.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil's Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Villain And Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelist’s true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone…

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: A Hard Day
programme.desc: After trying to cover up a car accident that left a man dead, a crooked homicide detective is stalked by a mysterious man claiming to have witnessed the event.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Beautiful Audrey
programme.desc: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Han Jung-woo. a star pilot suffers a drastic fall due to a momentary mistake was blacklisted from all airline. In a desperate bid for survival, he adopts a new identity as his younger sister and manages to find re-employment, yet this newfound stability is soon threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Returns
programme.desc: Role-playing mystery show <Crime Scene> is back after 7 years! Cast members will be playing different roles in a murder case and have to find out the murderer hidden among them.

programme.title: Street Food Bikers
programme.desc: Join actor Ryu Soo-young and Michelin-star chef Fabrizio Ferrari as they hop on their 'Food Bike' and introduce K-Food around the streets in Spain.

programme.title: Twinkling Watermelon
programme.desc: A magical story of growth and self-discovery about a CODA boy with talents in music who accidentally travels back to 1995, meets his father who just turned 18, and together they form a band called "Watermelon Sugar".

programme.title: My Happy Ending
programme.desc: Seo Jae Won, a mother and a successful CEO who is obsessed with chasing after success, faces a shocking truth after she is betrayed by three men whom she trusted the most.

programme.title: My Happy Ending
programme.desc: Seo Jae Won, a mother and a successful CEO who is obsessed with chasing after success, faces a shocking truth after she is betrayed by three men whom she trusted the most.

programme.title: No Way Home
programme.desc: A camping life guide for people who want to go camping! Follow Girl's Generation's Sunny and Hyoyeon to learn from A to Z of camping, find your preference in camping and your true self.

programme.title: Iron Girls 2
programme.desc: Join 4 actresses in their rigorous journey of blood, sweat and tears as they challenge themselves against boxing in the new season of Iron Girls.

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3
programme.desc: A single dice roll sends our cast members on a wild ride around the globe. Prepare for jaw-dropping twists on the revamped game board and an epic scale that transforms every destination into a theme park!

programme.desc: In the seventh season premiere, the squad investigates a hip-hop record label when one of the artists and six bystanders are gunned down. Brenda becomes the target of a civil suit.

programme.title: Arrow S2 2
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu to convince Oliver to return home to Starling City, where he finds things much worse than he imagined.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 16
programme.desc: At a cell phone store, Michael reveals an exciting new way to fix your tablet, and later, he makes a drink that's impossible to swallow. Plus, a dog owner loves that Michael has turned her pet into the smartest animal in the world.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 17
programme.desc: Michael turns leftovers into beauty products at a soap shop, and at a record store, he shows a hip-hop fan how to jump around. Plus, at a children's store, Michael's co-worker learns about the dangers of babysitting.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 4
programme.desc: Things get awkward when Georgie and Mandy try to make new friends. Meanwhile, Jim and Audrey get competitive playing a game with Connor.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 10

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 4
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori look to cash in on their first big trip to New Orleans, but the locals are hungering for a fight. Then, the Taylor Brothers wage war to win a locker loaded with hunting and sporting equipment. What no one knows is that hidden beneaththe fishing poles, bear traps and camping gear is the score of a lifetime. And later, fireworks explode when a locker full of liquor and rare Mardi Gras masks spark a do or die bidding war.

programme.title: The Closer S7 1
programme.desc: In the seventh season premiere, the squad investigates a hip-hop record label when one of the artists and six bystanders are gunned down. Brenda becomes the target of a civil suit.

programme.title: Arrow S2 2
programme.desc: In the season two premiere, Diggle and Felicity travel to Lian Yu to convince Oliver to return home to Starling City, where he finds things much worse than he imagined.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Take a ride on the dumb side! TruTV is counting down the 20 most moronic motorheads ever caught on tape. You'll see a car cut in half, a bumper-loving pig, and the snow plow driver who makes vehicles disappear. Along for the ride is our hilarious cast of comedians, including Rachel Feinstein, Kevin McCaffrey, Sean Donnelly, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 3
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 1
programme.desc: Michael shocks a receptionist with a medical procedure that leaves both their jaws on the floor, and then at a party store, Michael reveals a regenerating piece of gum. Plus, an electrifying trick rewrites history.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 2
programme.desc: At a library, Michael shocks people with every trick in the book, including a voice-controlled page-turner and outfit changes that almost get him recognized! And later, Michael amazes a trainee with a weightless mattress!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 5
programme.desc: Back on the bayou, the buyers are ready to crack open the abandoned lockers and throw down some serious cash. Local legend FJ sees big dollar signs in old voodoo artifacts. Brandon and Lori unearth a rare find with a potentially priceless payout. Andall bets are off when a bidding war over endangered species taxidermy ends in a heated stand-off with the local authorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1 6
programme.desc: The buyers press their luck in Sin City where Brandon and Lori get outfoxed by a group of locals with a questionable strategy. Then, Jesse gambles on a locker filled with junk. Everyone thinks he's crazy, but he knows something they don't. And later,vintage slot machines and poker tables send bidding through the roof. The closing price is stratospheric, but what's hidden from sight will be the ultimate payday for one lucky Storage Hunter.

programme.title: The Closer S7 2
programme.desc: As the LAPD undergoes a major realignment, Brenda's team investigates the murder of a young girl who was house-sitting. Captain Raydor's forced to expand her audit of Major Crimes.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Over a decade ago, a pathway called a "gate" appeared, which connected this world to another dimension. People called those who fought against the monsters on the other side of the gate "hunters."

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Jinwoo and the others are exploring a low-ranked dungeon, and they step into a temple dungeon they've never seen before. What awaits them inside are three rules, along with a monster that sends them into despair beyond fear.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Jinwoo remained alone in the temple dungeon to save what's left of his party.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: Jinwoo enters an instance dungeon from the entrance of a subway and levels up as he defeats monsters.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: Hwang Dongsuk’s party is short on their member quota to raid a C-rank dungeon. Jinwoo, along with another member, Yoo Jinho, join them in bolstering their numbers and the party makes easy work of the monsters and proceeds on.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: It seemed like the raid of the C-rank dungeon was going well.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While clearing the C-rank dungeon, Jinwoo annihilates every member of Hwang Dongsuk's party, who had tried to kill him for personal gains.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: Jinwoo has been looking for the item displayed in the window, the Elixir of Life, for his sick mother. But the quest to obtain this item is too difficult for Jinwoo that it would be nearly suicidal to attempt.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: At B20:C20r's Association, Jinwoo is reunited with Song Chiyul, Lee Joohee, Kim Sangshik, and Kang Jeongho, who have survived the Cartenon Temple. And he goes to explore the D-rank dungeon with Kang Taeshik and the others from the Surveillance Team.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: After the battle with Kang Taeshik, Jinwoo survives the tragedy once again. However, Woo Jinchul warns him that Hwang Dongsoo, an S-rank hunter, may be after Jinwoo's life.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Out of the blue, a "job-change quest" pops up in Jinwoo's window. Feeling that it may help him get stronger, Jinwoo sets foot into a gate.

programme.title: Solo Leveling Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite being cornered, Jinwoo manages to defeat the Crimson Knight, Igris. Without a moment of respite, another window pops up to announce a new quest.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might…

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo—

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 22
programme.desc: Three men have died under similar circumstances from a cursed spirit. Investigators discover the victims all attended the same middle school, so Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to investigate. Once they arrive, they learn it was Fushiguro's old middle school. There they learn that the victims were all found unconscious beneath Yasohachi Bridge, a local haunted location. They also learn that Fushiguro's older sister, Tsumiki, is caught up in this incident as well

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 23
programme.desc: In addition to the curse of Yasohachi Bridge, Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki face off against Kechizu, one of the special grade cursed objects: Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings. The three start fighting within the barrier of Yasohachi Bridge's curse, but something suddenly seizes Kugisaki's arm and drags her outside the barrier. Itadori and Kechizu chase after her, leaving the barrier. Left behind, Fushiguro quickly takes of the Yasohachi Bridge curse--until he witnesses a shocking sight.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 24
programme.desc: The Cursed Wombs: Death Paintings, Eso and Kechizu, face off against Itadori and Kugisaki, but the two begin to rot after they're bathed in the blood of Eso and Kechizu. Driven into a corner, Kugisaki hammers a nail into herself to activate Resonance and start a game of chicken with the brothers. Itadori refuses to stop and continues to attack Kechizu, but-- This whole mission began with one of Ryomen Sukuna's

programme.desc: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk. Will meeting the number one hero, All Might, change his fate?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it. Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: At the entrance exam, Izuku falls behind as the other students defeat faux villains left and right. Will he be able to get enough points to pass?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: It's Izuku's first day of high school, and he still can't control his new Quirk. Will he make it to the second day of school with his eccentric new teacher?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Izuku somehow gets through his first day of school and falls into a regular schedule of classes and training at U.A. In their first class with All Might…

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: Izuku is up against Katsuki in their first class with All Might! Can he and Uraraka beat the villain team of Katsuki and Tenya before time runs out?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: After the combat training lesson, the students and All Might reflect on their matches as they think about their next steps.

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Class 1-A has to elect a class representative, and everyone wants the job! How will they choose? And what lies in wait for them at the next class?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Villains have attacked USJ, and it's up to Class 1-A to stop them. What are the villains after? Will All Might be able to save the day again?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: The students of Class 1-A are up against the League of Villains. Will they survive long enough for help to arrive?

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: All Might has finally shown up, but will he be able to defeat Nomu and save the day?!

programme.title: My Hero Academia Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: As the battle at USJ winds down, Izuku and All Might think about its repercussions. Meanwhile, the villains slink home to plan their next move.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 1
programme.desc: Ryomen Sukuna

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 2
programme.desc: Itadori wakes up in an unfamiliar room and before him rests Gojo Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, who declares Itadori's secret execution has been decided upon. Gojo presents Itadori with two options. He can be executed immediately, or he can hunt down all 20 of Ryomen Sukuna's fingers and die after absorbing all of them...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 3
programme.desc: Itadori, Fushiguro, and Gojo head out to meet up with the third first year, Kugizaki Nobara. Thereafter they head to an abandoned building where Gojo tasks Itadori and Kugizaki with exorcising the curses lurking inside. Once inside the building Itadori and Kugizaki split up to look for the curses and Kugizaki faces off against a cunning curse that takes a child hostage.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 4
programme.desc: An emergency breaks out at a juvenile detention center and Itadori, Fushiguro, and Kugisaki are dispatched to handle it. Their mission is to verify and rescue any survivors left inside with the curse womb that could develop into a special grade cursed spirit. Itadori and the others storm in to find a merciless reality waiting for them. Immediately thereafter, Kugisaki disappears and the special grade cursed spirit appears beside Itadori and Fushiguro.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 5
programme.desc: After retreating outside the juvenile detention center, Fushiguro notices the death of the special grade cursed spirit. The very next moment Ryomen Sukuna appears beside him, and rips Itadori's heart from his body to take him hostage. Fushiguro begins fighting Sukuna to prevent Itadori from dying when he regains control, but he becomes painfully aware of the difference in their strength

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 6
programme.desc: Gojo stews in his frustration over Itadori's death. Both Fushiguro and Nobara are depressed by their teammate's death, but they begin their special training with the second year students to get stronger. Meanwhile, Geto and the others begin to make their move. And during all of that, the dead Itadori...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 7
programme.desc: While in transit Gojo is suddenly attacked by the special grade cursed spirit Jogo. After launching several attacks that never hit--Jogo comes face to face with Gojo's strength. In an instant Gojo returns to Jujutsu High and easily picks up mid-training Itadori which causes Jogo's anger to erupt. He takes his next move, to which Gojo—

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 8
programme.desc: While they're training for the exchange event, Kugisaki and Fushiguro come face to face with Kyoto's Jujutsu High second years - Zen'in Mai and Todo - who challenge them to a fight. Todo overwhelms Fushiguro with physical strength. Meanwhile, Kugisaki is disgusted by Mai's comments and says something to provoke her

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 9
programme.desc: Yoshino Junpei skips school to go to a movie theater, but then he witnesses the classmates who bullied him getting their faces transfigured and dying. He chases after the culprit and calls out to them. Later, Itadori and the ex-salaryman first-grade jujutsu sorcerer, Nanami Kento, storm into the scene of the crime within the theater and encounter two cursed spirits.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 10
programme.desc: Itadori is placed in charge of investigating Yoshino, so he turns to his assistant supervisor, Ijichi for a plan. Their plan to have a low-level curse attack Yoshino and gauge his response fails, so Itadori speaks to him directly. After watching Itadori ultimately drive away the teacher he hated, Yoshino decides to hear him out. Meanwhile, Nanami has pinned down Mahito's base and he delves into the underground sewers to face Mahito.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 11
programme.desc: Mahito corners Nanami, but he releases the limiter on his cursed energy, destroying the wall of the underground channel with Ratio Technique: Collapse, and causing rubble to rain down upon them. Meanwhile, Itadori makes contact with Yoshino and they hit it off after talking about movies. He meets Yoshino's mother, and after being invited into their home, more is revealed...

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 12
programme.desc: Mahito deftly uses Yoshino's admiration toward him to make him fight Itadori. Yoshino races toward vengeance and Itadori exchanges blows with him to try and make him explain his motive, which leads to him learning the cruel truth from Yoshino's lips.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 13
programme.desc: Nanami steps in at the last second to save Itadori from Mahito's blow. Then Itadori and Nanami match their attacks together to ensure they can exorcise Mahito. Mahito pulls out his transfigured humans in an attempt to mentally drive Itadori into a corner, but Itadori manages to overcome them. As Mahito grows trapped under their rain of blows he senses his pending death

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 14
programme.desc: After escaping from Itadori and Nanami, Mojito reunites with Geto and the others to try and move their plan forward. Meanwhile, Jujutsu High is about to host its Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Kugisaki and the second years Maki, Toge, and Panda all meet up to greet Todo and the other Kyoto students on arrival. Sparks immediately start to fly when Gojo rushes in late to the meetup and presents his surprise

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 15
programme.desc: The Kyoto Sister School Exchange Event's group battle begins. Kyoto's Todo rushes to attack the Tokyo students, but Itadori takes on the role of stopping him and faces off against him. Itadori's overwhelmed by Todo's power, but suddenly Todo asks him what kind of woman is his type

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 16
programme.desc: Todo points out that Itadori's Divergent Fist is a technique that won't work against special grades. When Itadori genuinely accepts his advice, Todo decides to face him and guide him with his full might. Meanwhile, Kugisaki picks a fight with Kyoto's Nishimiya. From the sidelines Mechamaru fires an attack at Panda, sparking the start of their battles with Kugisaki against Nishimiya and Panda against Mechamaru.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 17
programme.desc: The Exchange Event's Group Battle continues! Maki and Miwa face off, but Miwa can't hide her surprise at the overwhelming strength Maki displays despite her grade ranking. At the same time, Kugisaki pursues Nishimiya as she flies around on her broom. Nishimiya talks about Mai's hardships and what it's like to live as a female jujutsu sorcerer, but Kugisaki cuts her off and counterattacks. Then Mai reveals herself

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 18
programme.desc: Battles are starting to be decided in different locations on the first day of the Exchange Event. Fushiguro faces off against Kamo, the heir to one of the three major clans. Kamo uses Blood Manipulation, a technique that controls his own blood, while Fushiguro fights him with shikigami and martial arts

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 19
programme.desc: The special grade cursed spirit, Hanami, suddenly intrudes on the Exchange Event. Fushiguro, Inumaki, and Kamo face off against Hanami, defending themselves as they race to cross the veil. The three are driven into a corner when Maki joins the fight and strings together a chain of attacks in combination with Fushiguro. However, even with that, they're still forced into dire straits by Hanami's overwhelming prowess.

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 20
programme.desc: Itadori and Todo join the battle against Hanami. Itadori lands his Black Flash, and his Todo unleashes his cursed technique as they keep up their combo attack. Alongside his "brother", Itadori, Todo overwhelms Hanami with his tricky cursed technique and his clever, (self-proclaimed) 530,000 IQ mental CPU,

programme.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 1 Episode 21
programme.desc: Gojo has driven Hanami away with his overwhelming strength. Mahito reunites with Hanami, who's on the verge of death, after stealing Sukuna's fingers and the Special Grade Cursed Object, Death Painting Wombs 1 through 3. They're steadily making progress with their preparations to seal Gojo Satoru on October 31st. Meanwhile, those with Jujutsu High are unable to discern the cursed spirits' objective.

programme.title: Out for A Kill
programme.desc: An unsuspecting university professor is an unwitting accomplice in a foiled Chinese cocaine deal. Wrongly imprisoned, he escapes to take his revenge and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 1
programme.desc: An untested global defence system triggers a swarm of devastating solar flares, resulting in catastrophic earthquakes and ferocious magnetic storms; an unprecedented CAT. 8 Armageddon. Can we stop the annihilation of the human race?

programme.title: Cat.8: Night 2
programme.desc: Much to the world's surprise, the sun releases a gigantic coronal mass ejection, as the elite task force of the dangerous secretary of defence is hot on Ranger and Whitlow's trail. They are mankind's last hope. Can they save us once more?

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

programme.title: Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: While travelling abroad, a guy falls for a Romanian beauty whose unreachable heart has its origins in her violent, charismatic ex.

programme.title: Generation Um...
programme.desc: Three adults during a single day in New York City filled with sex, drugs, and indecision.

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.

programme.title: The Peacekeeper
programme.desc: When a terrorist group steals the US President's personal communications computer for launching the US arsenal in case of war, only a heroic Major has the key to prevent a Presidential assassination or a nuclear holocaust.

programme.title: The Philly Kid
programme.desc: A former NCAA champion wrestler, paroled after ten years in prison, agrees to a series of cage fights to save a friend's life and is asked to do the impossible - lose.

programme.title: 1275 Days
programme.desc: 15-year-old Blake faces life in prison for felony murder after a botched home invasion. His single mom and girlfriend support his David vs. Goliath legal battle in Elkhart, Indiana, seeking a second chance.

programme.title: Kill Craft
programme.desc: Marina lives with her disabled mother and her hit man father. When he dies at work, she must take charge of the family business and take care of her mother. Marked to die, Marina must navigate the world of assassins to survive.

programme.title: The Last Champion
programme.desc: When his mother dies, scandal-ridden ex-Olympian John Wright returns to a hometown that has not forgiven him.

programme.title: Notorious Nick
programme.desc: Nick Newell, a one-armed MMA fighter, gets a rare chance to fight for the lightweight championship. He strives to win for himself and all the other people in the world with physical challenges.

programme.title: Crank: High Voltage
programme.desc: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

programme.title: Men of War
programme.desc: A former Special Ops soldier leads a group of mercenaries to an island in the South China Sea: their mission is obtain the rights to the unusual treasure that the island beholds.

programme.title: Mercenary for Justice
programme.desc: A mercenary gets involved in a mission that threatens the lives of his kin. In order to succeed, he must break into one of the most well guarded prisons in Eastern Europe and free the son of the most notorious drug lord in the world today.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

programme.title: Replicant
programme.desc: Scientists create a genetic clone of a serial killer in order to help catch the killer, teaming up with two cops.

programme.title: The Legend Of Hercules
programme.desc: The origin story of the mythical Greek hero. Betrayed by his stepfather, the King, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.

programme.title: Fast Charlie
programme.desc: For twenty years, Charlie Swift has been a fixer and hitman for a mob boss named Stan. After a rival boss puts a hit on Stan and his crew, Charlie is the sole survivor. Charlie decides to avenge his friend.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: Picking up directly from the previous movie, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman keeps a diary of her extended stay at a mental hospital.
